McGowan: Damn it. Get out here and fight, you pussies!!!

~~~~~~

Hazel ove=
rheard this in the Chivtron base.

Hazel: Damn. Periwinkle, go fight them.
=

Periwinkle: Alone!?

Hazel: GO!

Periwinkle runs off.

Bronze: Their going=
 to kick her ass.

Hazel: Probably.

~~~~~~

Virgo smiles upon seeing Periw=
inkle step out of the Chivtron base.

McGowan: Okay. Now, we just rip into =
her to attract the other shitrons.

McGowan fires off a missile at Periwink=
le. Virgo fires off an energy draining dart towards Periwinkle and Lee fire=
s a fireball towards her. Barrymore fires off a missile at Periwinkle while=
 Depp fired 6 plasma shots towards her. Papertron launches a grenade that l=
ands behind Periwinkle while Birdbot threw a knife at her.

Papertron: COOO=
OOOOONE!

Birdbot: ROCK 'N' ROLL!

Periwinkle barely avoids McGowan's missi=
le. It strikes the ground near her, creating a dust cloud which blurs her v=
ision and is struck by Virgo's dart. She pulls it out but it doesn't do any=
 good as she begins to feel weaker. Her vision clears up and has enough tim=
e to sidestep, only getting grazed on the arm. 2 out of 6 of Depp's shots s=
trike her while she dodges Barrymore's missile but Birdbot's knife flies in=
to her left leg, sending her to her knees as she fires at McGowan twice, on=
ce at Depp and twice at Venom. The shots sail past McGowan, as they weren't=
 very well aimed and Depp let's the single shot strike him...

  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: Narrator 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Wednesday, January 30, 2002 2:19 AM
  Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base/H=
elp for Windlord


  Chop Shop yawns. Bombshell looks at an invisible watch=
. Shrapnel falls asleep. Venom starts humming some stupid sounding song. Ki=
ckback starts laughing for no apparent reason. Barrage stares off into spac=
e, having a day dream.

  Ransack: If they're not going to fight us man to =
man, what's the point?...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Rudr=
a656@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, January 28,=
 2002 7:42 PM
    Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base/Help for Windlord


  =
  ::Terrataur/Aerotaur:: 
          She scampers inside after the others, d=
etonating the tunnel behind her.  She heads up to the bridge.  "They're all=
 inside chief." 

          Aerotaur nods.  "Good, now we just have to wait=
 them out and hope the shields hold."

bject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

ject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
